website_summaries.verdict: This gaming computer performs well as-is, but also allows room for future improvements.
pros: Features 1TB hard drive and 16GB RAM, making it ideal for gaming
Also has 3.5 GHz AMD processor and Nvidia GeForce GTX video card
Case  has enough room to allow for additions and future improvements
cons: The fans are a little noisy
Included Wi-Fi adapter doesn't work well

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up, beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after not upgrading for a very long time. I don't have the luxury of being able to take the time to investigate parts and then go through with the set up. I was comfortable with the price, the parts, and the quality. Once I got it all set up it was a no brainer. This was an awesome decision. Expertly packaged, wire management on-point, good mix of hardware, and a awesome looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie

customer_reviews.title: No Issues.  Works as it should at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old machine several weeks back with this SkyTech PC. I do not use this for gaming, but only for some freelance designing I do, so the graphics card was an important element. (CAD, modeling programs, PS) I wavered between the 1050 TI and 1060 TI cards but decided on the lesser (cheaper) model. I have not been disappointed. The machine has been flawless so far.
customer_reviews.author: dmc

customer_reviews.title: Good system for the money with excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fast system for the money. The fans are a bit loud. Plays my games at a pretty decent frame rate for it not being a high-end system. I had problems with the OS install and the memory, but Sky Tech reps helped me out and sent me new memory to get the system working 100%. I would recommend these guys.
customer_reviews.author: DarBy

customer_reviews.title: Only negative thing I can say other than that it's a great piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: It's loud. Only negative thing I can say other than that it's a great piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gaming computer running all my current games on high to ultra high graphics. Cool looking case and design. Good specs for the price. Very quiet. Easy to start just plug and play, all the components of the computer were there nothing was faulty. Overall a great starting gaming machine!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Computer crashed fatal crash after 3 days after my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Computer crashed fatal crash after 3 days after my son got it for his 12th bday. :( still haven’t received full refund from my return
customer_reviews.author: The seale's

customer_reviews.title: Nice Weekend Wasted
customer_reviews.text: Got it early and was excited to spend some time trying out my games. Instead I got to spend lots of time trying to trouble shoot a random full-system lock up issue. Occurred consistently on every boot after 30s - 30 minutes. Seems like it would be a great PC... if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Baird

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this product a 3 star on tech support ONLY because I have not had any issues with it and have not needed tech support yet so I am not sure on that. This computer is awesome for your buck. I game a lot and it has a lot of downloading capabilities. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great PC, even greater support from the company. When I set it up windows hadn't been activated. I got in touch with customer service told em the problem and no fuss no muss they gave me a key no questions asked. The graphics card at the time I bought it was pretty good. Still runs most everything I play with no problems. Boots super fast thanks to the OS being on a SSD. For the price I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had issues at first, however tech staff was very responsive and got everything settled. Running smooth.
customer_reviews.author: terry carr

customer_reviews.title: Great system for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what I got.... With the prices climbing for computers due to the bitcoin craze.... It was a great deal.... Would buy from them again... Great company to deal with over all
customer_reviews.author: bigboyzback

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME really quiet and sooooooo pretty. runs amazing! Package arrived on time and everything was really well packed. Sky tech you guys know what you're doing awesome job
customer_reviews.author: Johnny H.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. I would recommend! Great value. Few crashes here and there but probably nothing out of the ordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Bewal

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed overall and have already began changing out parts
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait prior to writing a review and this review mainly goes towards the company. When I received the PC it was missing a stick of ram. I reached out to the company on both amazon and their website and heard nothing. The wifi adapter was corrupt and is unable to be used. When it's plugged in the PC just had errors and crashes. To top it off the keyboard went out very quickly to where it won't work. Very disappointed overall and have already began changing out parts. If you're looking for an entry level PC by all means purchase it but don't expect any type of follow up or communication.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great PC and even bettter customer service. We had an issue with Window 10 and they promptly solved my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Poor design makes this a less-than-ideal gaming box
customer_reviews.text: Three things I didn't realize about this computer that, had I paid closer attention, would have kept me from buying it at all in the first place... The power supply doesn't have enough connections to add any other internal devices, there is no mounting bay/hardware to add an additional hard drive, and there is no way to add a DVD CD-RW drive at all (the case simply won't allow it). So, it's off to the store to buy external devices to add to this machine to make it truly useful. Operationally, the computer seems fine so far, but we've only had it for a week, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Arr

customer_reviews.title: The computer is good, it allows me to play in good resolution ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer is good, it allows me to play in good resolution dark souls 3. The only point that I do not like is the Coil Whine when playing and it takes a while to leave some games, approximately one to two minutes. although this sound is already common in some video cards. Out of this is a good team I give four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ma.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good PC overall, great for gaming. I'd recommend an increase in ram though.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Argaez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to for a great price. Runs Black Desert Online at medium at 40-60 fps very happy with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Dvi/vga/hdmi
customer_reviews.text: I got this Pc yesterday and it is everything i ever wanted! It was very well packaged and everything i needed was seperatly packaged in the big box. The one problem i found was when i tried to hook up my two monitors, it didnt have a VGA port, only a HDMI and DVI. The pc came with a DVI cable so i was able to hook up one monitor so i had to purchase a DVI cable seperatly. Im so happy i got this system and i cant wait to spend every second playing all the games!
customer_reviews.author: laurencatino

customer_reviews.title: One thing to note is this pc is VERY loud ...
customer_reviews.text: One thing to note is this pc is VERY loud. Also my CPU cooler makes a whining noise when under stress. It makes my room hotter than my last pc. 4 stars because it plays all the games I want on ultra 60fps
customer_reviews.author: Jenni-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: the hard drive crashed and no back up to restore
customer_reviews.text: was a great computer out of the box but after about 3 weeks it rebooted and the hard drive was not bootable and could not restore or anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pc , And I’m in love it runs games like he’ll let loose, arma , and the isle like a dream this is definitely the best bang for ur buck as far as I’m concerned only thing is that you’ll probably want to upgrade storage and the mouse and keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too priced
customer_reviews.text: If you want a pre built pc when some what decent specs you could go with this but trust me this is really over priced, you could just build yourself one of these with a 1060 6gb instead of 3gb, have a ryzen 3, have liquid coolin instead of the stupid CPU stock cooler they got, and you would save about 100$, do not waste your money people smh
customer_reviews.author: Landon Shadow Clark

customer_reviews.title: Random Information
customer_reviews.text: These are just some random facts about the PC that might be useful if you are going to be modifying/researching about it: The case is a MasterBox 5 Black & White Mid-tower The motherboard is a ASRock 970A-G/3.1 You can fit one 120mm Fan at the back, a 120 or 140mm fan at the top and 2 120 or 140mm fans at the front Their is room for cable management in the back
customer_reviews.author: Kenan Krause

product_meta.title: SkyTech Oracle - Gaming Computer PC Desktop - AMD FX-6300 3.5 GHz, 120GB SSD, GTX 1050 TI 4GB, 1TB HDD, 16GB DDR3, 970 Chipset Motherboard, Windows 10 Home (GTX 1050 TI | FX-6300 | 16GB)
product_meta.description:
Size:GTX 1050 TI | FX-6300 | 16GBWe here at SkyTech Gaming pride ourselves on providing the ultimate gaming experience with quality, design, affordability, and the passion that we have for our systems. Our gaming machines are designed with uppermost quality components so our gamers feel that they have the reliability and speed to get them to the next level of any game of their desire. Unlike other competitors, we DO NOT cut corners on components for profit. We care about the occasional novice gamer to the Pro Gamer because we value our fellows gaming community. 

The SkyTech Oracle assembled with AMD FX-6300 and GTX 1050 TI 4GB Graphic Card. SkyTech Oracle also includes 16GB DDR3 1866 RAM and 120GB SSD for ultimate speed & user experience. This powerful PC equips with Thermaltake 120mm RIING Blue LED fans with high static pressure design for superior cooling performance, airflow, and absolute quietness. In conclusion, you must see the system yourselves to appreciate the beauty & quality that SkyTech designs. 

Specification

Processor: AMD FX-6300 Vishera 6-Core 3.5 GHz / 4.1 GHz Turbo Unlocked
Motherboard: AM3+ 970 Chipset Gaming Motherboard (Not generic motherboard that other company will cut corner on) 
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 TI 4GB Video Card (Brand may varies) 
Memory: High Performance 16GB DDR3 1866 MHz Gaming Memory (Not generic memory that other gaming company will cut corner on)
Power Supply: 500 Watt 80 PLUS Certified Power Supply
HDD: 120GB SSD
Second HDD: 1 TB 7200 RPM Hard Disk
Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Home 64-bit
feature_bullets: ✔ AMD FX-6300 3.50GHz / 4.1 Turbo 6-Core CPU Processor | 120 GB SSD | 1 TB 7200RPM Hard Drive
✔ Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 TI 4GB GDDR5 Video Card | 16GB DDR3 1866MHz Gaming Memory with Heat Spreader (Not Generic Memory) | Windows 10 Home 64-bit

✔ AMD 970 Chipset Gaming Motherboard (Not Generic Motherboard) | 1 x DL-DVI, 1 x Display Port 1.4, 1 x HDMI 2.0 | 8 x USB (4 X USB 2.0; 4 X USB3.0) | High Performance 500 Watt 80 Plus Certified Power Supply (Not Generic Power Supply)
✔ Wi-Fi Ready | High-Pressure 120mm LED Blue Fans | No bloatware | Free Keyboard & Mouse | Monitor Not Included
✔ 1 Year Manufacture Warranty on Parts and Labor | Lifetime Free Technical Support | Assemble in the USA
